pros: Great work life balance, opportunity for growth
cons: Required to work evenings and weekends occasionally

pros: Not a bad company. Pays well and there's support from managers.
cons: Some coordinators can be rude at times.

review_title: Collaborative, Inclusive and Diverse Work Environment that supports both Employee & Student Success
job_title: Education Team Member in Surrey, BC
pros: Stenberg College has supported my professional growth and development over the last 15+ years through paid Professional Development Opportunities, Performance Check Ins, Peer Reviews & Advancement. It is a truly collaborative work environment that is fun, flexible, diverse and full of heart. The entire Stenberg College Team is committed to employee/faculty satisfaction, an inclusive work environment, continual industry partner and subject matter expert collaboration, and overall student success. Great place to work!
cons: While I feel blessed to get to work from home with a flexible deliverables based position, I sometimes feel alone in my work if I don't take the time to reach out to my peers/colleagues. The regular team building meetings make a positive difference for me.

review_title: Living my best life and found my dream job!
job_title: Industry Relations Manager in Surrey, BC
pros:
-Positive atmosphere and culture
-Supportive co-workers
-Flexibility with working from home (for many jobs).
-Long term employees
-Support for growth and advancement
cons: Being able to work from home is amazing but can sometimes lead me to work longer days since my work is so accessible. But this is more of a me problem.

pros: coworkers are pretty nice, management flips over often.
cons: really bad pay, they have favorites and it shows,

pros: Nice organization skills, lots of support from the directors

job_title: Student Services Assistant Manager in Surrey, BC
pros: The team I work with is one that is filled with understanding, compassion, caring, success driven, and supportive.  The team only wants the best for each other as well as for the students we support.
cons: Due to the nature of my job, it can feel  a little isolating, however the team is just a quick message away and always willing to assist when needed.

pros: I was at Stenberg College for over four years and truly enjoyed my time there. From the Leadership Team to Admin Staff, everyone truly cared about the organization and contributed to its success. Most managers/VPs supported open communication/collaboration and recognized exceptional employees. My colleagues there were amazing!
cons: Although the wages/salaries are competitive to current trends, I believe the benefits package could be improved.

pros: Great Management, flexible schedule, work life balance, friendly teams that work well together.
cons: If I have to add a con to this review I guess it would be that  higher compensation would be appreciated.  However, don't we all always want more, no matter where we are at.

pros: I've been working here for over a decade and have enjoyed each and every year. The company really is passionate about Education and treats their employees with respect.
cons: Parking at some sites is difficult as Central City is very busy

pros: Great Place to work! Management care for their employment and are always willing to help.
